{"id":950536949,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1684121356,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"23 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/950536949/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Power of Heroes","memory":"54.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int sumOfPower(int[] nums) {\n        // int ans=0;\n        // int mod=1000000007;\n        // Arrays.sort(nums);\n        // for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){\n        //     ans+=(nums[i]*nums[i]*nums[i])%mod;\n\n        //     for(int j=i+1;j<nums.length;j++){\n        //         ans+=(nums[i]*nums[j]*nums[j]*Math.pow(2,j-i-1))%mod;\n\n        //     }\n        // }\n       \n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        long result = 0;\n        long prev = 0;\n        for(int i = nums.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {\n            result += (prev*nums[i] + ((1L * nums[i] * nums[i]) % 1000000007) * nums[i]) % 1000000007;\n            prev = (2 * prev + 1L*nums[i] * nums[i]) % 1000000007;;\n        }\n        return (int)(result % 1000000007);\n    \n\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"power-of-heroes","has_notes":false}
